sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { Button } from "@material-ui/core"; import SendIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Send"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import { MainContainer, DashboardContainer, ControlsContainer, ChartsContainer, LogoContainer, MainTitle, SocChartsContainer, EnvChartsContainer, LandFillContainer, EmissionContainer, ReqContainer, ChartPaper, colorRed, ChartTitle } from "./styles"; import { ValueContainer, MapContainer, ControlContainer, FamiliesContainer } from "./containers"; import { Message } from "./components"; import { fontSizeM, FlexContainer } from "../../styles"; import { LandFillSubContainer } from "./styles/styledContainers"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { selectAllSelectedItems } from "../../store/furnitureBankReducer/selectors"; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ button: { background: colorRed, color: "white", fontSize: fontSizeM, boxShadow: "none", "&:hover": { background: colorRed, color: "white" } } })); const Dashboard = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const items = useSelector(selectAllSelectedItems) console.log(items); return ( <> Furniture Bank 2019 What is the estimated social impact of your donation? What is the estimated environmental impact of your donation? What will be the estimated amount of waste saved? Number Icons Equivalent to 15.5 days of avg. Canadian household waste Number Icons Equivalent to 20% of an avg. cargo container ); }; export default Dashboard;
